mapper.sql: id, main_order_no, order_no, third_party_order_no, status, process_status, settlement_unit_code, imp_and_exp_type, terms, port_departure_code, port_destination_code, overseas_suppliers_code, proxy_service_type, good_time, is_freight_collect, is_other_expenses_paid, is_dangerous_goods, is_charged, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.main_order_no mainOrderNo, a.order_no orderNo,a.status, a.process_status processStatus, a.imp_and_exp_type impAndExpType, a.terms, ap.name port_departure, ap1.name port_destination, a.create_user createUser, a.create_time createdTimeStr, ab.airline_company airlineCompany, ab.flight,ab.etd,ab.eta, ab.warehousing_no warehousingNo, a.settlement_unit_code subUnitCode, a.legal_entity_id, ab.agent_supplier_id supplierId, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM order_payment_cost opc WHERE opc.order_no = a.`order_no`) + (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM order_receivable_cost orc WHERE orc.order_no = a.`order_no`)>0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) cost FROM `air_order` a left join air_port ap on ap.`code`=a.port_departure_code left join air_port ap1 on ap1.`code`=a.port_destination_code left join air_booking ab on a.id=ab.air_order_id and (ab.`status` != 2 OR ab.`status` IS NULL)
and a.order_no like concat('%',#{form.orderNo},'%')
and ap.name like concat('%',#{form.portDeparture},'%')
and ap1.name like concat('%',#{form.portDestination},'%')
and a.main_order_no IN
#{item}
and a.status = #{form.status}
and a.process_status IN
#{item}
and date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{form.beginCreatedTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{form.endCreatedTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM order_payment_cost opc WHERE opc.`order_no` = a.order_no AND opc.`status` = '2' and opc.sub_type = 'ky') OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM order_receivable_cost orc WHERE orc.`order_no` = a.order_no AND orc.`status` = '2' and orc.sub_type = 'ky'))
and a.`legal_entity_id` in
#{legalId}
order by a.id desc

select a.id, a.main_order_no mainOrderNo, a.order_no orderNo,a.status, a.process_status processStatus, a.imp_and_exp_type impAndExpType, a.terms, a.port_departure_code, a.port_destination_code, a.legal_entity_id, a.legal_name, a.settlement_unit_code, a.overseas_suppliers_id, a.proxy_service_type, a.good_time, a.is_freight_collect, a.is_other_expenses_paid, a.is_dangerous_goods, a.is_charged, ap.name port_departure, ap1.name port_destination, a.create_user createUser, a.create_time createTime, a.order_taker, a.receiving_orders_date, a.invoice_no invoiceNo FROM `air_order` a left join air_port ap on ap.`code`=a.port_departure_code left join air_port ap1 on ap1.`code`=a.port_destination_code where a.id=#{airOrderId} order by a.id desc

select count(*) from air_order
and status=#{status} and (process_status=0)
and `legal_entity_id` in
#{legalId}
group by status
